messages.title: ONLY BY VOTING FOR GEORGE HOLLINGBERY CAN WE ACHIEVE THE CHANGE WE NEED.
messages.content: Keeping development under control of central Conservative policies will see the ditching of eco-towns and the protection of back gardens from development.

messages.title: REWARDING RESPONSIBILITY
messages.content: People who have saved all their lives, bought their houses and paid their taxes shouldn't change when they need help. Conservatism plans will change that.

messages.title: George is simply THE BEST CHOICE
messages.content: People are worried about crime, the erosion of values, about Government intrusion into our lives, about the level of immigration and about the economy.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Keeping development under control with the Conservatives' policy.
Ensuring that people who have worked hard are supported when they need help.

issues.economy: People are worried about the economy.
issues.environment: Stopping the ditching of eco-towns and protecting back gardens.
issues.governance: Worries about government intrusion into personal lives.
issues.immigration: Concerns about the level of immigration.
issues.socialWelfare: Change in support for those who have saved and worked hard.

housing.content: Keeping development under control with the Conservatives' policy.

leaflet.personalStatement: George Hollingbery lives in Alresford for 15 years and has been involved in the local community ever since moving. He got involved in politics to protect a local landmark, he has been a councillor and a charity fundraiser.

politicalExperience.achievements: Environmental work, developing traffic schemes to reduce speed limits.

endorsements.endorsement: "Despite our differing political allegiances, I always knew who to turn to over the weekend. George, your quick and effective response aided an early resolution to the problem. We can't thank you enough."

images.caption: George Hollingbery addressing concerns with locals
George Hollingbery with a group advocating for traffic safety

leaflet.additionalNotes: George has been involved in various community efforts including challenging the construction of a supermarket, has run a number of his own businesses, and has 'real life' experiences. He has also begun environmental work aiming to reduce speed limits in the Meon Valley.
